title: Remove Duplicates
statement:
# Remove Duplicates

Remove duplicate elements from an array while preserving order.

## Problem Description

Given an array, print the unique elements in the order they first appear.

## Input Format

First line: integer N
Second line: N space-separated integers

## Output Format

Space-separated unique elements in order of first occurrence.

## Constraints

- 1 ≤ N ≤ 10^5
- -10^6 ≤ elements ≤ 10^6
